metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10906 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/net/ethernet/arc/emac_main.c in theLinux kernel before 4.5. A use-after-free is caused by a race conditionbetween the functions arc_emac_tx and arc_emac_tx_clean.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10906` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.18.0-13-generic - 4.18.0-13.14~18.04.1
linux-image-4.18.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.18.0-13.14~18.04.1
linux-image-4.18.0-13-lowlatency - 4.18.0-13.14~18.04.1
linux-image-4.18.0-13-snapdragon - 4.18.0-13.14~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.18.0-13-generic - 4.18.0-13.14~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.18.0-13-lowlatency - 4.18.0-13.14~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1002-oem - 4.15.0-1002.3
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1002-kvm - 4.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1002-azure - 4.15.0-1002.2
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-1002-azure - 4.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-gcp - 4.15.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-1001-gcp - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1030-gke - 4.15.0-1030.32
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.0.0-1011-gke - 5.0.0-1011.11~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1007-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1005-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1053-snapdragon - 4.15.0-1053.57
No subscription required
